references.paper_title: Infrared and visible image fusion methods and applications: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of image fusion methods, offering valuable context and background for the advancements proposed in this paper.
This paper introduces the Convolutional Block Attention Module (CBAM), which is used in the fusion control module of this paper for multi-modal feature fusion.
